content.title: Intro
content.content:
1972
Preceded by
1972
1973
Year
1974
Followed by
1974
You may also be looking for Third Age 1973.

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1973.

content.title: January
content.content:
14 - Reader N.J. Kyle writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien.
17 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to N.J. Kyle.
24 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 347a.
25 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Patrick Hunt, who is in prison.

content.title: February
content.content: 26 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Stefan Petterson.

content.title: March
content.content:
3 - A tobacco bill is submitted to J.R.R. Tolkien, on which he scribbles a note.
6 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 348.
8 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 348a.
8 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 349.
24 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 349a.

content.title: April
content.content:
9 - W.H. Lewis, Inkling, dies.
20 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Dr. Denis Tolhurst.
20 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to John Higgins.

content.title: May
content.content:
16 - J.R.R. Tolkien takes a holiday to Bournemouth.
18 - R.B. McCallum dies.
24 - J.R.R. Tolkien is interviewed concerning the election to the Oxford Poetry chair.
24 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 350.
29 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 351.
30 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Philip Brown.

content.title: June
content.content:
5 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 352.
5 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to James A.H. Murray.
14 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Elena Jeronimides.
14 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Bruce Charlton.

content.title: July
content.content:
8 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Norman Power.
12 - J.R.R. Tolkien is awarded an honorary Doctorate of Letters by the University of Edinburgh.
28 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Campbell.

content.title: August
content.content:
4 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 353.
9 - The last photograph of J.R.R. Tolkien is taken by Michael Tolkien, in front of his favourite tree, the Pinus Nigra, at the botanic garden in Oxford.
17-20 - Mythcon 4.
24 - Actress Grey DeLisle is born.
25 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Glyn Daniel.
28 - J.R.R. Tolkien takes a holiday to visit friends in Bournemouth.
29 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 354, the last letter to be included in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien.
30 - J.R.R. Tolkien goes to a birthday party for Denis Tolhurst's wife.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien lunches with Robert Murray (and possibly others).

content.title: September
content.content:
2 - After visiting friends in Bournemouth, J.R.R. Tolkien becomes ill and dies, at the age of eighty-one. He is buried next to his wife, Edith.
6 - A requiem Mass for J.R.R. Tolkien is held in the Church of St Anthony of Padua in Headington, Oxford. Father Robert Murray assists.
29 - W.H. Auden, long time friend of Tolkien, dies.
? - Mythprint (Vol.8, No.3), including a letter from J.R.R. Tolkien to Joan O. Falconer, is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
1 - Actor Duncan McIntyre dies.
? - Games designer Nathan Segerlind is born.

? - Rosfrith Murray, friend of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.
? - Funeral Customs in Tolkien's Trilogy is published.
? - The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1974 released.
? - The Myth and Fantasy Calendar 1974 released.
? - The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1974 (UK) released.
Years
1970 1971 1972 1973 1974 1975 1976
